alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 4:42AM PDT until March 16 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter travel conditions should be expected over the pass. Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be sure to check conditions on the DOT page before heading out. Periods of light snow will continue through midday. Snow intensities are expected to ramp up later this afternoon and evening which could lead to rapidly changing conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
